name: chicagotribune
text:
Today in The Spin:
– First day back for many Illinois businesses

– Lori Lightfoot's "coded" message for Donald Trump

Here are today’s top stories in Chicago politics, from @byldonovan: https://t.co/sJUxYRC6ke

name: chicagotribune
text: Friday marked the end of the statewide stay-at-home order in Illinois, as Gov. J.B. Pritzker loosened restrictions on a range of businesses and activities, and lifted a cap on the number of people who can gather for religious services. Here's a recap. https://t.co/5TEa7Ukvww
